title: Країна Мрій
overview: Oleg Skrypka places Ukrainian flags on the musical map of Europe. The leader of the band "Vopli Vidopliassova" travels to European cities where Ukrainian musicians live and create. In each episode, they perform popular songs in a new way.Where the roots of the song Summertime come from, why "Shchedryk" is famous all over the world and how Ukrainian music exists in the world today - this is only a small part of what you can learn from "Kraina Mriy".
